sentences.en: To explain this, they hypothesize that galaxies must contain a great deal of missing matter which cannot be detected.
sentences.cn: 为了解释这一点，他们假定银河系一定包含了大量无法探测到的不明物质。

sentences.en: Some scientists hypothesize that the extinction of the dinosaurs resulted from the effects of an asteroid collision with Earth.
sentences.cn: 一些科学家假定，小行星撞击地球导致了恐龙的灭绝。

sentences.en: But others hypothesize that a new supercontinent will form in a different way.
sentences.cn: 但也有人假设，一块新的超级大陆将以一种不同的方式形成。
